thread.title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC

title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
text:
Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' at New York Theatre Workshop in 2016 THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   19, 2015 - 1:20 pmLast Updated: October 19, 2015 - 1:20 pm   
People: 
New York (1742) 

NEW YORK â€” A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway next fall when Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo appear in a production of William Shakespeare's "Othello" at New York Theatre Workshop. 
Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for "Fun Home" will direct the tragedy, with "Selma" star Oyelowo playing the title role and super spy 007 Craig as Iago. The show is slated for fall 2016 and additional casting will be announced later. 
Until then, Craig plays James Bond in "Spectre" out next month and Oyelowo is next slated to co-star with Zoe Saldana in "Nina" about late singer Nina Simone.
